docstring.long_description: These dataframes should both be single columns.
docstring.short_description: Take two dataframes with the true and predicted labels from a classification task, and indicates whether the prediction was correct or not.

parameters.name: true_label
parameters.description: true label users can select from original data

parameters.name: predicted_label
parameters.description: resulting predicted label users can select

returns.description: The input predictions dataframe, with an extra boolean column "prediction_correct".
